actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insurance, Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Insurance, Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To repeal the requirements under the United States Housing Act of 1937 for residents of public housing to engage in community service and to complete economic self-sufficiency programs.
short_title: Public Housing Tenants Respect Act of 2011

summary.text: Public Housing Tenants Respect Act of 2011- Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to repeal its public housing community service and family self-sufficiency requirements.

titles.title: Public Housing Tenants Respect Act of 2011
To repeal the requirements under the United States Housing Act of 1937 for residents of public housing to engage in community service and to complete economic self-sufficiency programs.
